data_table.description: CHD Derived Variables. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: CMIDX
variable.description: Myocardial infarction classification of an event

variable.name: CSTEMI
variable.description: ST-Segment Elevation myocardial infarction:1 for yes, 0 for No

variable.name: CNSTEMI
variable.description: Non-ST-Segment Elevation myocardial infarction:1 for yes, 0 for No

variable.name: CESFYR
variable.description: Earliest Year of Cohort Surv Events

variable.name: CEVTFU
variable.description: Follow Up Days to Event Since Baseline

variable.name: CMIFU
variable.description: Follow Up Days to myocardial infarction Since Baseline

variable.name: CDTHFU
variable.description: Follow Up Days to Death Since Baseline

variable.name: CESFDATE_DAYS
variable.description: Earliest Date of Cohort Event - Days from Exam 1

variable.name: CMIDATE_DAYS
variable.description: Date of MI for Cohort Event - Days from Exam 1

variable.name: DTHDATE_DAYS
variable.description: Date of Death for an Event - Days from Exam 1

variable.name: BIRTHDAT_DAYS
variable.description: DATE OF BIRTH OF SUBJECT Q11 - Days from Exam 1
